spanGrp.span: I learnt our language from my parents.
bizım dil bän örgändım bänım mamam babamdan
But Russian and Georgian languages we learnt at school and yard.
ama urus dilidä gürji dil biz školadada dišärdä örgändıh
but Russian language -ACC -and Georgian language 1.PL school:SG.F.NOM -LOC -and outdoor learn -PST -1.PL
We spoke Russian and Georgian at home, also my parents spoke Turkish.
ävdä söilierdıh biz urusča gürjüjä anam babam söilierdı türkčä
house -LOC speak -IPFV -PST -1.PL 1.PL Russian Georgian mother -POSS.1.SG father -POSS.1.SG speak -IPFV -PST Turkish
But we did not speak as much.
Now we speak Russian and Georgian.
We speak Urum with old people, such as grandmother and our parents.
urumja mm o stariki kak babuška ana babainan söilierıh babainän söilierıh urusča urusča yoh bizım diljä
Urum HESIT that old.people:PL.NOM like grandmother:SG.F.NOM mother father -INSTR speak -IPFV -1.PL father -INSTR speak -IPFV -1.PL Russian Russian NEG.EXIST 1.PL -GEN language
We go to Istanbul sometimes and our children learn there our language.
čojuhlarınan biz gidierıh stambula orda örgänerlär bizım čojuhlar bizım dili
baby -PL -INSTR 1.PL go -IPFV -1.PL Istanbul -DAT there -LOC learn -IPFV -PL 1.PL -GEN baby -PL 1.PL -GEN language -POSS.1.SG
But they don’t hear this language a lot here.
ama burda čoğ duimierlär bu dili
but here -LOC many hear -NEG -IPFV -PL this language -ACC
